website_summaries.verdict: This magnifying glass is built to last. We like the large, rectangular viewing area and generous array of 10 LED lights built into the frame.
pros: The wide horizontal lens feels natural for reading and requires less hand movement
Dimmer switch for lights is a nice feature
Comes with carry pouch and cleaning cloth

customer_reviews.title: great magnifier, doesn't fit our needs
customer_reviews.text: Magnifier I ordered this this magnifier for my spouse who has very poor sight because of wet & dry macular degeneration. Shots have stabilized the wet, but the dry and damage macular has left her with bad vision. To our disappointment she tried the magnifier, but it is not strong enough for her to see. So am returning it. If you have one that is much stronger with the LED lights, please let me know. She uses the computer magnifier set at 300, but she needs something for other task such as reading print and etc.. There is nothing wrong with the fine LED magnifier, it just doesn't fit her needs. thanks
customer_reviews.author: robert McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Bright Lights, Easy Reading!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my mother-in-law and she loves it, except for a minor problem with the battery cover. The company quickly replaced it, no problem. So, I bought one for my dad and he loves it as well. It magnifies very clearly; small print, numbers, even cell phone screens. This is the ideal magnifier because of the large rectangular shape and the bright lights when you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Laco

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly bright with large field of view
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier is incredible! Large field of view and the LED lights are super-bright. The light is adjustable so you can set it at whatever amount you want. A little heavy but the weight is well balanced so it's not a problem at all. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vic B

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This one is the best, and I’ve tried many. The variable light intensity is a big plus—it can get as bright as a flashlight. The lens is better than the other consumer grade magnifiers. I just bought a second one for my wife, who also loves it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Magnifier with bright lights and 3X large print enhancer
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift to my 95 year old friend who has problems with his vision. He loves it. It has greatly improved his ability to read. He won’t need to cancel his subscription to the newspaper now and his spirits have lifted a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Yorba Linda

customer_reviews.title: I ordered several magnifying glasses-this is my favorite..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several magnifying glasses-this is my favorite....especially for reading. The light is great and adjustable. Well worth the price. I'd buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, but does not magnify 3X for me.
customer_reviews.text: Although beautifully made, it does not magnify 3X. I compared it to other magnifiers of 3X power and there is no comparison. It did not magnify text for me. Using a "necklace of LEDs is a great idea. Rheostat wheel must be turned to maximum brightness.
customer_reviews.author: RVN SF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnifying glass with great light to illuminate what you ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent magnifying glass with great light to illuminate what you are looking at.. The Light switch is awkwardly placed but I will recommend this product to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Sox Fan

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great magnifier with good build. Surprised me by the quality of image. LEDs light up whatever is in range.
customer_reviews.author: tony hallen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful magnifying glass until power switch stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my Dad. He really liked it until the power switch (turns lights on and off as well as brightness) stopped working. He thought he wasn't using it correctly until we tried using it. We wished that it had lasted a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: Product broke immediately , poor quality
customer_reviews.text: First one i purchased broke in the first day of using it (the light switch dial). Stupid me thought it was a fluke and bought another one. Same thing happened the light switch broke 3 days after it arrived. I will return them for sure. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifier.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great magnifier. I love the rectangular shape as it provides a natural reading/viewing position. The round shapes of other magnifiers made it awkward to read sentences that extended beyond the circle. The surface area of this magnifying glass is large enough to accommodate sizable areas of the page. The light is an added plus with a brightness that facilitates comfortable reading in low light areas. The handle is also comfortable to hold. It's the ideal magnifier to fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but only while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: When the light got weaker and kept flickering off, I replaced the batteries. The light got stronger WHEN it stayed on but it kept going off as I tried to make it brighter or sometimes, it wouldn't light up at all until I tried turning if off and on a few times. I believe the switch if faulty.
customer_reviews.author: frederica b johnson

customer_reviews.title: GOOD AS A READING LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: The Magnipro magnifying glass was nicely designed and looked well made, but as far as magnification it fell short. The lens did not provide the stated magnification that I was hoping for. It did not magnify the small print by 3 times it just provided light. The only good view was from the small circular spot on the bottom of the lens that magnified by 5 times. If you need a handheld reading light and not a magnification device this item is for you. This device is being returned today. PS: I purchased other magnifying devices on Amazon that work better and were less expensive. I thought this rectangular lens would be great, but it was not.
customer_reviews.author: So Much to Learn - So Little Time

customer_reviews.title: It made reading a delight again.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 94 yr old mother-in-law who has macular degeneration eye disorder. She loved to read but was not able to for some time... then I found this for her. She just loves it... and it is easy for her to hold onto, for it is light weight for her to hold onto, and the LED dimming to brighter lighting makes it so she can see what she is reading. I'm so happy I found this on Amazon for her.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 86 year old mother who wads using reading glasses and a magnifying glass to read. Now she can read using the MagniPro alone, she loves the bright light and the magnification. After seeing this product first hand I decided to purchase one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: No batteries included and no notification provided on box!
customer_reviews.text: A lovely instrument, but on Christmas morning my husband was baffled because the light wouldn’t operate. Checked the box. Checked the English version as well as we could given the size if the type, and could find no reference to batteries. Ahah! We discovered the empty battery compartment, but la king advance directives, had no AAA batteries available. Big disappointment. CHANGE THAT BOX AND TELL THE USERS IN ADVANCE TO OURCHASE THISE BATTERIES.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Good product and decent value
customer_reviews.text: Nice magnifying glass. Had a loose piece rattling around in the handle, which was a little annoying. I wrote to the Vendor to see if it were possible to take apart to remove the loose piece, but upon examination it appears the only possible place to remove a screw to take it apart, would be the battery compartment. And I decided not taking a chance to break it. Lights up well and decent magnification. Customer Service at the Vendor responded quickly and pleasantly, even if it didn't offer to replace the item. Does what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Places the right amount of light that you need to read
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 91 yr old Mom who has macular degeneration along with other age-related issues, like arthritic hands. She finds it easy to hold and likes how it places the right amount of light and magnification on the print. She liked to read but found that her macular degeneration really made it difficult causing her eye strain. Now, with this magnifier, she can read much more easily. Thank you for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect to help me read better. I have macular degeneration in my dominant eye which makes it difficult for me to read small print with my other eye. This magnifying glass with light is absolutely perfect to help me read better. I take it with me when my husband and I go in the car in case I need to look at small print while he is driving. Would definitely recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Judy S. Kilborne

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this magnifier! Great design. Ease of use. Adjustable lighting. A storage pouch to prevent scratching. A cleaning cloth. The fact that it takes AAA batteries that most of us have on hand as opposed to special batteries is a bonus. This is a well made product by a company that clearly cares about quality. I’ve purchased several magnifiers through the years that were always lacking. This time I found a gem and I highly recommend it. Even the little flexible magnifier that came with it is great. I carry it in my purse for use when I’m away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Stowers

customer_reviews.title: Superior magnification
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional device. I have large magnifying glasses, readers, flashlights, no combination of them does the job this lightweight device accomplishes: it makes it possible to read clearly, without strain. The incorporated lights are dimmable and can reach astonishing brightness. I had given up reading anything on a page or a label. With the magnipro, I am now able to read again.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Hazan

customer_reviews.title: Light problems
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the on/off switch is poor The battery compartment is also an issue This could be an outstanding product. However these defects make it very frustrating to use the light feature by having to manipulate contact to keep the light on
customer_reviews.author: JTE

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am a coin collector and I have trouble seeing the detail and dates on the coins? I do use a microscope on certain coins but this MagniPros Magnifying Glass is great for scoping out particular coins that need to go under the scope. The magnification is just right and the lighting is phenomenal for my needs. You can control the brightness of the lights and the lights are spread around the perimeter of the magnifying glass so there ore no shadows. It is a great product and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Spenegdt

customer_reviews.title: Great to use. Built in lights make it easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for my wife and she loves it. Had a guest visit from overseas and she saw it and loved it too. I ordered one for her to take back with her.
customer_reviews.author: Oldfart48

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifier and light, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for nearly two months and it has been extremely helpful. Now we can read the small print. The light on this magnifier is very bright and makes it so much easier to read small print. Would not hesitate to recommend, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Nana 2 go

customer_reviews.title: Saved a good recipe book
customer_reviews.text: I found the best vegetarian recipe book. It has great photos, background nutritional information, and hundreds of recipes. The only problem is, the text uses an unreadable 7 point text size. I considered throwing the book away until I found this magnifying glass. The glass is well made, easy to hold, has a light with variable brightness, and is easy to hold. I have many vegetarian recipe books but this one is my favorite, saved by a great magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic magnifier!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a decent magnifier and saw this one with the built in LED lights. It's works great! I'm able to find serial and part numbers on small items like watch batteries and electronics. I was pleasantly surprised that it came with a soft fabric drawstring pouch to protect it between uses, a cleaning cloth, and a bookmark size magnifier to keep in my wallet. I plan to also buy one for my elderly relative.
customer_reviews.author: NovaKay

customer_reviews.title: How Did I Ever Live Without This Glass ?
customer_reviews.text: This is no ordinary magnifying glass. THIS is a finely made, bright all around the perimeter, finely-ground glass, Top Quality magnifying glass for my every need. I could not find it one day. Immediately, I knew where to look - the drawer next to my wife's leather recliner in the living room. She always has been a THIEF ! I'm going to buy two more for me and 'hide' them this time. MAN stuff..
customer_reviews.author: Bosco Bear

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 10 stars. I first purchased it for my 86 y/o father who is almost completely blind. He has always been a big reader and now everything is so blurry he can hardly see the words. This magnifier has lights which makes the words easier to see to begin with, it's rectangular style makes it easier to hold and he doesn't have to move it so much to use it. It has really made life better for him again. He even asked me to order 2 more, one for his 96 y/o sister who also is almost blind and an elderly friend. Everyone is very happy with it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Punkin

customer_reviews.title: O-K
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product and the LED lights are great. The viewing area is too small and the magnification at 3x is not enough for elderly eyes. Magnification should be at least 6X.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney E. Colling

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well!
customer_reviews.text: I have macular degeneration and I use this for reading. After trying a variety of products with limited success, I found this to be just what I needed. Delighted with the variable light output and magnification seems just right. Thank you MagniPro people for making it possible for me to read again!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Westcott

customer_reviews.title: Nice rectangular viewing area
customer_reviews.text: Love the rectangular lens and adjustable illumination. Wish the handle could be slightly angled to be more ergonomic. The descriptive photos belie the fact that the 5x portion of this device is really only a small round bubble shaped portion of the lens area. I found that it detracted from the utility of the rectangular main lens. Also wish had purchased the 4x lens instead of the 3x lens. Overall, this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sturdy design. I live the light! It can be very bright! It definitely magnified it by at least 3x. It also has a little circle in the corner where you can see even finer detail. I hate leaning in or holding my books to my face so this definitely helps! Thank you! I also love the carry pouch and the micro cloth that it comes with. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: miniminitooka08

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this magnifying light for my husband. He reads constantly and as he has aged sometimes the type in some books are smaller. Because of this he would return a book to the library. Finding this light has made a big difference in his reading. I know I did the right thing by buying this light. Easy to hold and illuminates the pages. Mary C. Campbell
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Magnifier is easy to hold and adjust.
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass was bought for an elderly woman with macular degeneration. It was a great buy for her. The size fits comfortably in her hand, and it is easy for her to adjust the brightness with the thumb without having to switch positions in the hand. Also the size covers a fairly generous amount of space without being cumbersome. I am thinking of ordering one for myself. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Ecellent reading light for vision impared persons
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed with this reading light. I have one provided to me by a social agency. This Magnipro glass far surpasses any reading glasses I have tried. This is an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: G. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great for Seniors that Are Finding it Hard to Read the Fine Print.
customer_reviews.text: The magnifying glass is just the right size for reading fine print with the right level of magnification. The adjustable LED lights all around it make it easy to have the right light to see what one wants to read in its entirety. I have another magnifying glass with light, but I find it challenging to get the light to point at the right spot. That is why I bought this one: A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with reading enhancement!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product! Wet AMD, affecting both eyes, made reading small print, i.e. newspaper, was practically impossible for me, or if I could make the print somewhat readable with my readers, was exhausted by the effort. This handheld reading magnifier greatly enhanced my reading ability, and the strong, dimmable LED light is a real plus. Lens magnification is very even--well packaged, and comes with a nice protection pouch and cleaning cloth. Sure helped me, so worth a try, if considering. Now maybe I can see to work on my taxes!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P. Rowntree

customer_reviews.title: Mom can read again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother. We had been using a round magnifier but this is so much more suitable for reading from a rectangular page. Mom loves it and she is reading so much more. There is a more powerful circular magnifier within the rectangle for the very find print. I can see the micro-print of US currency with that part. Requires 3 AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brame

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent Lighted Magnifier
customer_reviews.text: The magnification is great on the wide screen and for a bonus, there is a small circle super magnifier. My sister can't stop saying "I love this so much". She says this has been one of the best gifts ever. She uses it for doing 1000 dot puzzles. She is able to easily hold it by its long handle while she works the puzzle with her right hand. The adjustable lights that circle the frame are a super bonus. 💕💕💕💕
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST IMPROVED VISION OF SEVERAL PRIOR MAGNIFIERS
customer_reviews.text: As a lawyer I am required to read fine print quite often. I have tried several magnifiers, some of which are lighted and one on the smart phone. None have given me the brightness and large (small) circle of higher magnification. This magnifier makes reading in general and small print easier and clearer. I have no hesitation in recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN DOE III

customer_reviews.title: A Great Magnifier -- Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like the older I get, the smaller the type size that's being used on packaging, instructions, etc That's why I need a magnifier, and the MagniPros Magnifying Glass does the trick for me beautifully. It's comfortable to hold, the LEDs brighten and dim easily, and the magnification is perfect. It's just what I needed and I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Marilee L.

customer_reviews.title: Back to Reading!
customer_reviews.text: The older I get, the smaller the print has become! Living in a very dry climate also leads to dry eyes as well, compounding the problem. I decided to purchase this magnifying glass to use at home on days when my eyes are struggling. I am very pleased with the product. It's comfortable to hold, a large enough area to see a section at a time and the light feature is great for dim conditions. I find myself grabbing it not just for reading, but to see tiny label information.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Haberstock

customer_reviews.title: MagniPros Magnifying glass
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and what it says it does. I had purchased 3 other magnifying products and they just werent BRIGHT enough, and not that easy to hold' If you have a problem SEEING this will help solve your problem. Now am able to read and study without further eyestrain. VERY good product and very good price
customer_reviews.author: anniecat

customer_reviews.title: Can see
customer_reviews.text: Can see an with the added light, even in the dark, I can see, great in use at the front door, coming home at night. Shines where its easy to insert the key.
customer_reviews.author: vark

customer_reviews.title: The lighting make it work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was using a standard magnifying glass without lighting which meant I had to light my book from overhead. The overhead lighting caused a glare on the page because it was going through the magnifier and caused me some problems. With this light the page is lit from the magnifier and allows me to read with a lot less strain. It's a perfect size for book reading as it can pick a full page at a time so you are only moving the magnifier up and down.
customer_reviews.author: WayneTTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Magnifying Glass ever
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has adjustable lights, that it has a handle and can either be laid on a book or magnified by adjusting with your hand position to the page. Although I am 72, I bought it for the guide to the Nintendo Switch game Zelda to help with the small print. I can see this coming in handy for many other times and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Connie in Lakeland

customer_reviews.title: The light dimmer feature is really nice
customer_reviews.text: Of the many different magnifiers I use, this has the nicest light feature because it dims and it is really nice, yet somehow this is not my favorite magnifier to use or the one I automatically look for to use. It is heavier than the others. I do recommend it. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Just the magnifying glass I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Great magnifying glass with nice even lighting for reading in bed or just in low light. Had been looking for something other than “readers” to make fine print easier to read and this works great. I’ve dropped it once with no noticeable damage, plus it comes with a protective carrying and storage bag to prevent accidental scratches. Would definitely recommend to anyone in a similar situation.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Orion

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My dad was going to quit taking the newspaper and I purchased this product for him. He was very thrilled with how easy it was to operate and the lighting was excellent and he could READ again. Well worth the money. Thanks seller.
customer_reviews.author: dennis bird

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I have recently gotten macular degeneration in one eye and have difficulty writing out checks and reading things. This has helped so much. Its a bit hard having the on/off button for the lights on the left side . I have to hold on to it with 2 hands but all and all I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Elaney

customer_reviews.title: Life Became Easier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago as my book I use for studying human anatomy has small text. Though I am young, I am near-sighted, so I was browsing the internet for a helpful magnifying glass. This one fit everything I needed. As an avid reader who sometimes finds herself up late at night, the light helps me to continue my reading. Also, I was pleasantly surprised to also receive a portable, smaller magnifying glass that I could carry around in my wallet. Overall, I recommend this to anyone who has trouble seeing as it is absolutely wonderful, and I will never get tired of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I use this glass to read the paper and read the "fine print" in low-light situations. Love its size and oh! those lights. Great that they are adjustable from low to super-bright. Makes working crosswords more accurate...no more mistaking square 18 for square 16. Best buy on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Monnalena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance of size and features
customer_reviews.text: For my mom who has MD. Fairly lightweight, great variable LED lighting on bottom. Display large enough to see clearly the magnified area with both eyes. Small enough to fit in a purse. Excellent balance of tradeoffs and seemingly well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It's everything that they claim it to be.
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable LED lights illuminate the subject and enlarge it so that it is bright and clear. The case is easy to open and close for installing AAA batteries. A small area magnifies the subject to 5X for even closer inspection. This purchase was for our second one.
customer_reviews.author: Pat T.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing !
customer_reviews.text: It was even better than the description. Perfect size, easy to hold, and I love the dimming range of the light. It was packaged so nicely with a lovely soft cover for it. I studied many magnifiers before deciding. I’m very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Grme

customer_reviews.title: Great light perfect for seeing outside with Big lens
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for friend he is like uncle to me 65 plus He loves it . I think glass would help but when you a image and not ready for it you fine the easy way but he can't stop love it light is perfect 3 modes and small letters are there with big Big lens.
customer_reviews.author: Dahc

customer_reviews.title: Life changing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my aunt since she has macular degeneration. She wasn’t able to read or see mail, computer screen, or anything else she needed to read. This has changed her life to be able to read and see with the built in light. I would recommend this to anyone who has macular.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Alwine Clark

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: As you get older a magnifying glass becomes an important tool. In the past I would opt to spend less and would regret my decision. This product was a little bit more but well worth it. Excellent choice on my part (I bought two of them) and would advise anyone looking for a magnifying glass to seriously consider this one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Shuler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Magnifying Glass
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size and shape magnifying glass. Easy to hold and shaped to make it easy to read down a page. Plus, it has a built in light that can adjust the brightness by a dial on the side. Really easy to use and convenient. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bad Eyes
customer_reviews.text: A combination of getting older (59) and diabetes has taken a toll on my eye site. It was getting harder to read my bible, until I found the MagniPro Led Magnifier. The size of the lens and the magnification makes it a lot easier for me to do my daily reading. The led lights make it easier for me to read while my wife is sleeping at night or early in the morning. I wish I had found this product earlier. I would recommend this product to anyone who is beginning to have problems reading small or regular sized print.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frink

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd MagniPross Magnifying Glass!
customer_reviews.text: This gift card offer will be used to purchase a Magnifier.for me which will be the 4th one. That speaks volumes!! I purchase for myself, show it to friends & family and I end up giving them as a gift. I do extensive study & reading so I need another ASAP. I love this magnifier especially its rectangular view.. Anonymous, Orlando, FL.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who need extra light and magnification!!!
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier is super bright and can be carried to stores if needed. It comes in a carrying pouch with a cleaning wipe to clean the lense. It is amazing and super helpful! Much better than a circular magnifying glass!
customer_reviews.author: KI

customer_reviews.title: So handy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We got this magnifier for my parents who are having age related vision problems. At first my sister was concerned that giving them the magnifier would make them feel depressed, but instead they were excited! My father was especially excited and was eager to take it into work because he has very small things he has to inspect. He loved the way he could make the light as bright as he needed. I followed the advice of another review and put a sticker on the side that should be facing up so that they aren't blinded by the bright light when they turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: JSchumacher

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighted Magnifier
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier was highly rated on the Wirecutter and it didn't disappoint. The lens is shaped for reading text and looking at pictures with ease. The light is good and you can vary the intensity. The on off switch works, but doesn't feel robust- the only thing that can be improved. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Must have for low vision folks!
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect for my visual impairment. No more fumbling around in the dark looking for AirPods, remote controls, etc. Especially great when you’re searching for items in that dark pantry. The adjustable light works great in a pinch for people who may be low vision, or anyone else in need of a little assistance in those dimly lit areas in your home. My only minor issue is that I wish the magnification was a little stronger, and light a tad brighter for my particular impairment. Other than that, I think it’s a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful item
customer_reviews.text: This are so helpful to have around that I bought several to have them available at strategic locals, i.e., the office, home and one in the car. I've had a need for each area and they are easy to use and extremely efficient.
customer_reviews.author: KLB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for close work
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass is perfect for ageing eyes. 3X is perfect for me but the 5x inset is nice if needed. The illumination with the adjustable LEDs is just right for use in a dim area. Nice and light but substantial. This one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: J. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: MY wife's eyes are getting worse and worse. This product help her so much. She loves to do puzzle books and it was getting really hard for her to read the puzzles. This magnifying glass helps her so much to be able to continue to do what she loves. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: James F. Seif

customer_reviews.title: The LED light is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful product. I purchased it as an aide in reading my new Concordance. The 3 way LED light is a great compliment to the width of the glass screen. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I can use this for reading small print- successful I don’t think I could read a whole book as magnification can be too much for the way. Great for threading needles and reading that small print.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbluefrog

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold , and easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: This is a really slick magnifier. Not only does it have a nice wide angle lense, but the inset 5x magnifier is very helpful. I frequently find new uses for it, sometimes reading medicine bottles or even repairing something with very small screws. If you use reading glasses, this is a must have. The quality is really nice, the only problem I see is that the carry bag is very thin and doesn't protect it well. It would be nice to have something like a hard shell case , however I am nitpicking. This is really nice and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy 2Tone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Clear
customer_reviews.text: I am a construction estimator who peers over plans much of my days and the old eyes were definitely feeling the strain so I got on to Amazon and took the plunge. I really like how comfortable the magnifier is to hold and is super clear. The additional features are great, the LED light is really and clear bright without glare and the extra powerful magnifier in the bottom corner is an excellent feature I will use often. The price was very reasonable, in fact I can hardly believe everything I get for the price I paid. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Graeme West

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: MagniPros' LED magnifier exceed my expectations. It is relative light and easy to hold. The dimmable light is a plus. It is perfect for those of us who are finding it more difficult to focus on small print as we age.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Just one disappointment...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good glass except that the piece that holds in the batteries doesn't fit tightly enough to hold in the batteries... very frustrating and annoying! Otherwuse, its a goid product
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cornelio

customer_reviews.title: Low power magnification
customer_reviews.text: The light is bright but the magnification doesn't seem that strong. They say 3x, but hardly seems like 1x.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Radi

customer_reviews.title: My favorite magnifier!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this! The light lights up the entire field and you can adjust the light strength up or down with a little wheel on the handle. It’s light weight and perfect for these old eyes trying to read faded receipts at tax time. Will be buying another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Worth

customer_reviews.title: FUNCTIONS WELL. A BIT HEAVY FOR MY WIFE RECOVERNG ...
customer_reviews.text: FUNCTIONS WELL. A BIT HEAVY FOR MY WIFE RECOVERNG FROM A STROKE. I HAVE MOUNTED IT ON A BLOCK OF WOOD SO SHE CAN SLIDE IT ACROSS THE PAGE, BUT SHE USES A SMALLER, LIGHTER MAGNIFIER. I END UP USING IT QUITE A BIT MYSELF.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnifier!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who is a stamp collector. He loves it! Big magnifying area and he said the lights on it are amazing and very bright! He was so impressed that he had me order another one for his stamp friend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Is the item still returnable?
customer_reviews.text: I need to return this item..it’s still in the Original packaging. The quality of the item was much less than I expected. I wanted to take to a Kohl’s but can no longer find the code. Is it too late?
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Best tool for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Im always looking for magnifying glasses to read medicine bottles. And when Im in a restaurant its tough to read the menus. Its dark and the writing is too small. This is a great tool for both and when you start using it you will find many more uses. It helps with threading needles. reading the fine print on mail, etc. I love that you can utilize a little light or a really bright light. For the price this is a truly versatile product. This is my third magnifier, I'm beginning to give them as gifts. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Maureen B.

customer_reviews.title: lighting on print, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was great, as was the overall experience. Even had protective advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rush

customer_reviews.title: This has 5X magnivication
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the 3X magnifiers I purchased and the lighting has a wide range of adjustment. It comes with a soft cloth cover though I would prefer the previous covers of leather for protection. Worth the price for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Wright

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very little zoom - need at least 5x to read labels and small fonts
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT ON MARKET
customer_reviews.text: My Mother has Mackerel Degeneration and even with her Glasses she had a hard time reading her mail and the Newspaper or anything as matter of Fact . She would try to pay some of her bills on phone and give wrong # of card so I had to write them very large with black sharpie. But I found this and thought I’d give it a try. This has been a life saver !!!!! She can see almost everything and I honestly think it’s because of the LED Lights Definitely BUY this you will be So GLAD you Did
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier is excellent and the lights are such an added plus in helping you see. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Magnifying Glass  ???
customer_reviews.text: Magnifying Glass THERE IS NO MAGNIFICATION IN THE MAIN PART OF THE GLASS JUST IN THE QURTERSIZE CONVEX. BUT THE LIGHT IS GREAT. THE HANDLE NEEDS TO BE REVISED FOR ME'.I AM RETURNING THIS MUSTY DO TO THE HIGH PRICE TAG.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE DEPEW

customer_reviews.title: Does not help to see if you have low vision
customer_reviews.text: Does not help people with low vision. Not enough magnification
customer_reviews.author: rb26

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifiying glass
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass is great. The brightness of the LED light is variable. It's construction is solid. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rainys A. Blekaitis

customer_reviews.title: led magnifier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this magnifier for myself and my husband, even though he doesn't want to admit he needs it, I find him using it every day, we can read small print so much faster now without struggling or frustration, the light works great when reading something with a dark back round, I want another one so we have one on each floor, no more running up or down to get it when needed. Thank you this is a wonderful product. Sherry Rinaldi
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Magnifying Glass
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass,with is adjustable LED light is wonderful. My main use so far has been reading a book. I can see the print clearly and the magnifier is easy to hold. I can recommend it for many uses!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Waskey

customer_reviews.title: Easy comfortable reading; great light with no glare
customer_reviews.text: This is the magnifier I reach for when reading newspapers... especially newspaper comics, which have shrunk so much! Still working fine after two years of gentle and infrequent use. Love the adjustable light level with easy one-thumb operation. Nice big clear lens is well-suited for reading. The arrangement of many dimmable bulbs produces great light with no glare. I turn it on and my eyes just relax. Will keep this forever.
customer_reviews.author: P. Spring

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool to have
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use the magni pro magnifying glass with the adjustable light for reading and also when I build and paint my model kits.
customer_reviews.author: Chivas

customer_reviews.title: the lens is distorted
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass has distortions that make it very difficult to read by. Because my eyes are not good (and, hence, the reason for my purchase) it took me a while to realize that it was the lens, not my eyes. I think this is not one solid lens but two lenses separated by space in the holder. I am finding this very unsatisfactory and will need to purchase a better quality magnifying glass. I would like to return this one.
customer_reviews.author: lynne coie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this magnifier!
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 years old and sometimes can't read small writing even with my glasses on but this magnifying glass with the adjustable light has been perfect! The images are very clear and I like the adjustable light. And when I need to see something very close I have the corner magnification that makes everything REAL close. It has a nice case to keep it in too. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mona L DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: I reccomend this magnifier!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice magnifier, light works well. Ergonomic grip is comfortable in hand. This is my first magnifying glass purchase. As I get a little older, some small print is difficult to make out even with prescription glasses on. After using this magnifier here and there for the past couple weeks, I'm confident I purchased the best available.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Why the light doesn’t work right
customer_reviews.text: Great unit but the dimmable light does not work very well.
customer_reviews.author: sandra morris

customer_reviews.title: Magnifier works well!
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier works exactly as described. The size is perfect and the adjustable light makes a big difference. This makes a huge difference in quality of life issues. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: DreamWeaver

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Turnaround time from order to delivery was excellent. The product was exactly as described. I would order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tracy

product_meta.title: MagniPros Magnifying Glass with [10 Anti Glare & Dimmable LED Lights] 3X+5X Dual Power Lens-Ease Strain Eyes & Provide Evenly Lit Viewing Area for Reading, Low Vision, Seniors, Macular Degeneration
feature_bullets: ★ RECTANGULAR SHAPES THE WAY YOU NATURALLY READ: The rectangular lens is especially design to simulate the way we naturally view things from left to right, the magnifying lens covers large viewing area without having your hands move all the time, lens is measured 4.35"x 2.7" and magnifies up to 300%.

★3X+5X DUAL MAGNIFICATION LENS: Made out of optical grade acrylic which is lighter and more scratch-resistant & shatterproof than glass while provides the same clarity level. The large rectangular main lens magnifies up to 300% while the smaller bifocal lens located at the corner of the main lens magnifies up to 5x(500%)- It is perfect for reading/viewing small prints Map, Newspaper, Magazine and also great for eye conditions such as aging eyes and macular degeneration.

★REDUCE EYE STRAIN & DIMMABLE LIGHTING : This led magnifier is clinically proven to be ideal for anyone who strains their eyes to see words on a page because it magnifies and provides light without glare. The roller dimmer allows you to easily adjust the brightness level(peaks at 600 lumens) with the tap of a finger to achieve the perfect lighting for various tasks.

★ LIGHTWEIGHT & ERGONOMIC HANDLE: Thanks to the special design premium lighter lens it only weighs 6.5oz, in addition, the handle of this LED magnifier is ergonomically designed to grip/hold comfortable for most hands, making it ideal for anyone who loves to read for longer period of time.

★ 10 ENERGY EFFICIENT & LONG LASTING SMD LEDs: Our SMD LEDs are powered by 3 AAA batteries(Not included) and are designed to last more than 100,000 hour. They provide more evenly lit viewing area, our LED lighting will last for more than 20 years without burning out or overheating. Save money and energy while enjoying long lasting bright light.
